resources.string: The current model does not have tool calling enabled. Please enable the model\'s tool capabilities in the settings to use features like search/MCP.
Please chat first before editing the title
Export conversation as a markdown file
Set default models for each feature
View app usage instructions and help documentation
RikkaHub - Open Source Android AI Assistant\n\nWebsite: https://rikka-ai.com/
You haven\'t configured API and model yet, please configure first
Select built-in tools supported by the model. These tools are directly provided by the API without requiring app support. Currently, this feature is only supported by the official Gemini API.
The model used for translation features
Model used to generate conversation suggestions, recommend using fast and inexpensive models
Model used to summarize conversation titles, recommend using fast and inexpensive models
Translation result will be shown here
Please don\'t modify this value unless you know what you\'re doing
Controls how many historical messages will be sent to the model as context. Messages exceeding this number will be ignored, only the most recent N messages will be retained, which can save tokens

When memory is enabled, the model will try to actively record your information during conversations and use it in subsequent conversations. This feature requires the model to support tool calls to work properly
When enabled, the assistant will reference recent chat history to provide more contextual responses
Are you sure you want to delete this assistant? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this provider? This action cannot be undone.
Maximum number of tokens to generate. Leave empty for no limit.
Controls the content format of chat messages before being sent to the LLM, usually no need to modify
Execute JavaScript code with QuickJS engine for calculations and scripting
No available AI providers, please add in settings
Are you sure you want to delete all conversations? This action cannot be undone.
Turn off reasoning functionality, the model will directly answer questions.
Let the model automatically determine reasoning level.
The model will use a small amount of reasoning to answer questions.
The model will use more reasoning to answer questions.
The model will use a large amount of reasoning to answer questions.
Whether to display user avatar in chat messages
Whether to display model icons in chat list messages
Whether to display model names in chat messages
Display token usage and message count
Automatically collapse thinking content after thinking is complete
Whether to display app update notifications
Display quick jump buttons on the right when scrolling the chat list
Create a new conversation when the app starts
Enable haptic feedback when messages are being generated
Skip crop interface after importing images or taking photos
Use pure black background in dark theme, suitable for AMOLED screens
Whether to enable streaming output for messages
Use assistant avatar and name instead of model avatar and name in chats
Set the default chat model for the assistant. If not set, the global default chat model will be used
Whether to enable this MCP server
Display name for the MCP server
Select the transport protocol type for the MCP server
URL address for SSE transport server

Configure custom provider settings for this specific model. Will inherit common properties from parent provider.
Response API is OpenAI\'s next-generation API. Most providers do not support it. If you don\'t know what this is, don\'t enable it.

Voice to use for speech synthesis
Control the speed of speech (0.1 - 3.0, 1.0 is normal)
Control the pitch of speech (0.1 - 2.0, 1.0 is normal)
